cast.name: 玛丽亚·瑞奥特 María Riot

writer.name: 拉菲拉·塔瓦罗内 Raphaela Tavarone

introduction: A six-day story of Joana and Thomas. She just moved to Berlin from Argentina and is eager to explore the city and the people who make it interesting. He crosses her path at a deli late at one night and they form a strong bond right away. Intrigued and excited by each other, they spend the next 6 days together. Despite the direct connection and attraction, there is something in him that she cannot understand. His charisma and intellect intrigue her to take the chance to explore this new relationship. This powerful connection makes the inner world of Thomas tremble, forcing him to confront deeply hidden insecurities in his past.
